properties.name: ourdiary.system-allowed-authorities
properties.description: Allowed authorities for the system.Authorities declared in com.example.ourdiary.constants.Authority.ex) ourdiary.system-allowed-authorities=ADMIN,USER.

properties.name: ourdiary.date-format
properties.description: Redefine the default date and time format for Jackson.Client should be aware of this format.

properties.name: ourdiary.date-time-format
properties.description: Redefine the default date and time format for Jackson.Client should be aware of this format.
